edu.sjsu.assignment3

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.assignment3.Appointment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Appointment>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DailyAppointment, MonthlyAppointment, OnetimeAppointment

    public abstract class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Appointment>
    Appointment is an abstract class, use to build more specific classes: OnetimeAppointment, DailyAppointment, and MonthlyAppointment. Link to this document "https://pkhanhdo.github.io/index.html"
    Author:
    Peter Do

      • include

        public boolean include(java.time.LocalDate date)
        inclusive helper, to determine a date is in between inclusive start and end dates of the object. This concrete method will be used for checking a LocalDate falls between start and end date in the occursOn() method implements by a concrete class
        Parameters:
        date - the LocalDate to check
        Returns:
        a boolean value.
        • true if the date in the parameter is within start and end date, or equal one of them.
        • false if the date is out of bound between start and end date.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Appointment apt)
              throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        The comparison performs by comparing start date, then end date, then description
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Appointment>
        Parameters:
        apt - the appointment object to be compared to
        Returns:
        an integer indicates how itself compared to the object of the same type (appointment)
        • 0 if itself is equal to the apt object in the parameter.
        • a negative integer if itself is less than the parameter object, and
        • a positive integer if greater
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException
